Thanks, looks good. The only problem I noticed was the aspect ratio has a slight problem. When played back at 2.35:1 everything is a little bit stretched horizontally. You can notice it right in the beginning on the logo where the earth is not round and other places too. I checked an original DVD I have, it's the same. I'm sure the encode is true to source. 

In VLC you can play it back at 2.21:1 or use the Pixel Ratio control in XBMC to correct it.
